short_summary: no security associated with the requirement
full_summary:
### Office Seating Procurement Announcement


#### Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating at the Fisheries and Ocean Canada facility in Bridgewater, Nova Scotia.

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: January 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 1, 2024


#### Solicitation Details

This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). It is also set aside from international trade agreements for small and minority businesses.

The requirement includes the purchase and installation of office seating chairs and stools. Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Non-SA holders can submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

#### Contact Information

For more information on becoming a pre-qualified SA holder, please contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

The official notice and solicitation documents can be found on the Ariba website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18424113?extsite=MTg0MjQxMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18424113?extsite=MTg0MjQxMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Region of Delivery

The work will be performed in Nova Scotia, Canada.

#### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located in Gatineau, Quebec.

#### Goods and Services Incorporated by Reference

This solicitation includes the following UNSPSC codes:

* 56101700: Office furniture
* 56112100: Seating


#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this solicitation are as follows:

* Price (50%)
* Quality (30%)
* Warranty and Maintenance (10%)
* Delivery and Installation (10%)

#### Associated RFx Items

This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number EB129-240995/A dated November 6, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to
